name: Louis by the Sea
description:
Louis the cat wakes up on the beach. His friend, Empus, has gone for ice cream. Can you help them reunite?

This is my first completed game, made using DragonRuby for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make a Video Game jam. I pulled it together for the jam, but I definitely want to go back to it and fix the (many many) snags and annoyances. 

I hope you enjoy :)
